original_text: The Lord became angry with Solomon because his heart had turned away from the Lord, the God of Israel, who had appeared to him twice.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 마음을 돌려 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와를 떠나므로 여호와께서 그에게 진노하시니라 여호와께서 일찍이 두 번이나 그에게 나타나시고

sentences.original_text: The Lord became angry with Solomon
because his heart had turned away from the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 마음이 그의 하나님 여호와에게서 떠났음이라

sentences.original_text: who had appeared to him twice
